item.title: Cable wires dumped outside 200 Marylebone road next to cycle parking bays, 3rd November
item.description:
Cable wire dumped on pavement outside 200 Marylebone road near jn to Gloucester place at cycle stand need to fix it clear out.

item.title: Trip hazard, 3rd November
item.description:
The bin has been broken away from its base leaving plastic sticking up from the pavement creating a trip hazard wspexially when the shop holders park 3 cars on the path and the customers park on the yellow line the area is unlit and my daughter tripped over it and into the road. Its been broken for months now. Unlike previous reports please don’t just remove it, in this case please repair or replace it. We need the bins due to littering issues.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pickford Close, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Kids playground covered in flags, 3rd November
item.description:
Newly opened community playground for children has been littered with flags and stickers. The playground near Erith Pier should be a safe, un-intimidating space for all nationalities and again has been used to spread hate and made to feel not all are welcome.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 115, West Street, Northumberland Heath, Erith, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Vomit at my doorstep, 3rd November

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bin Bags on George Lane pavement near Le Delice, 3rd November
item.description:
I have reported this on numerous occasions before but someone keeps leaving rubbish bags on the pavement on George Lane next to the Le Delice grundon bin. They are dumped on the street late at night and then the foxes get at the bin bags, leaving rubbish strewn all over the pavement and street. It is a public health issue and needs to be cleaned up ASAP. Preventative action also needs to be taken as this has happened regularly for the past four months in exactly the same spot (likely by the same culprit).

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 221, George Lane, Hither Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet
